com.exacttarget.etpushsdk

Class ETLocationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETLocationManager

  • public class ETLocationManager
extends Object
    ETLocationManager is responsible for finding an accurate location and retrieving a list of geofences from ExactTarget. These regions are monitored for entry and exit and will trigger various notifications when boundaries are crossed.

      • startWatchingLocation

        public void startWatchingLocation()
        Start monitoring geofences. Retrieve a set of nearby geofence messages after we know where the user is located.

      • startWatchingLocation

        protected void startWatchingLocation(boolean setByApplication)

      • startWatchingProximity

        public boolean startWatchingProximity()
        Start monitoring beacons. Retrieve a set of beacon proximity messages.
        Returns:
        boolean - true if we successfully started monitoring iBeacons, false if Bluetooth LE is available, but not currently turned on.

      • stopWatchingLocation

        public void stopWatchingLocation()
        Stop monitoring geofences.

      • stopWatchingLocation

        protected void stopWatchingLocation(boolean geoEnabled)
        Stop monitoring geofences.
        Parameters:
        geoEnabled - - true to stop monitoring, but keep location on
